
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52060212">
<font size="2">关于大佬 <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=978330" target="_blank">@WXJYXLWMH</a> <font face="&amp;quot"><strong>猫抓_Cat_Catch--网页媒体嗅探下载合并v2.5.6</strong>(</font>https://www.52pojie.cn/thread-1973152-1-1.html)</font><br>
<font size="2">使用方法的一些探索。</font><br>
<font size="2">有人在下载视频的时候碰到了下面的问题①。而我在使用过程中碰到了问题②。</font><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">①</font><br>
<font size="2">ERROR: An invalid request URI was provided. Either the request URI must be an absolute URI or BaseAddress must be set. </font><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">②</font><br>
<font size="2">09:48:13.910 INFO : N_m3u8DL-RE (Beta version) 20240630<br>
09:48:13.924 INFO : 加载URL: https//vod-adaptive-ak.vimeocdn.com/exp=1729827377~acl=/22f4e6a9-6dad-4c1b-ad27-10f696125861/*~hmac=43b17cc02848ee69b938adb45c7efe83ece36d44dc62b7492679da78fa327b4f/22f4e6a9-6dad-4c1b-ad27-10f696125861/v2/playlist/av/primary/sub/161870883-c-ja-x-autogen/playlist.m3u8<br>
09:48:13.924 ERROR: An invalid request URI was provided. Either the request URI must be an absolute URI or BaseAddress must be set.</font><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">经过本人的一番搜索，找到了下面的解决方案。</font><br>
<font size="2">希望对碰到类似问题的朋友有所帮助。</font><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">无法使用N_m3u8DL-RE 录制直播视频<font color="#1f2328"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"> </font></font>[color=var(--fgColor-muted, var(--color-fg-muted)) !important]<font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot">#528</font></font><br>
<font size="2">https://github.com/xifangczy/cat-catch/issues/528</font><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">具体做法就是修改一下猫抓里[color=color(srgb 0.114667 0.114667 0.114667)][backcolor=color(srgb 1 1 1)]<font face="__Inter_a4efb0, __Inter_Fallback_a4efb0, system-ui, arial">N_m3u8DL-RE的参数。</font></font><br>
<font color="#59636e"><font style="background-color:rgba(129, 139, 152, 0.12)"><font face="ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, &amp;quot"><font style="font-size:11.9px">"${url|replace:"https:","https%3A"}"</font></font></font></font><font size="2">[color=color(srgb 0.114667 0.114667 0.114667)][backcolor=color(srgb 1 1 1)]</font></td></tr></tbody></table>
